description: Warp printed & woven. Chintz finish. 3 puffy plumes repeated in staggered rows. Vert. rpt. 29"; horiz. 50.5". Warp Printed & woven in Switzerland; chintz finish. Drk. peach bkg with 3 puffy plumes (grey, white, gold) repeated in staggered rows.29" vert. rpt. 50 1/2" horiz. rpt. Cameo
